Class ServerService

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    class for managing server-side communication with client(and Model)

      • realize

        public void realize()
        Function realizing server-side communication with client through sockets. It receives all important input data from client and, using classes from Model, transforms it only to be sent to client. :(
